## Vector3.axisPX() method

Creates a new Vector3 pointing in the positive direction of the X axis, i.e. vec3(1, 0, 0)

**Signature:**

```typescript
static axisPX(): Vector3;
```
**Returns:**

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)

The new vector
